Text: Do you really think that people who are young enough to want this or people who have kids will want to pirate something? And yet, there are already 11 other people who want this.

This isn't about pirating something!

This is software that is over 10 years old! You won't be picking this up at the store. They don't make it anymore! 

This is a great game to help kids learn and have fun.
Thank you for making this available. I DO appreciate the time you spent on uploading and seeding! So thank you!
Please seeeeed, I played this game when I was 5 and it introduced me to computer gaming. Please seed
